<h1 class="govuk-heading-xl govuk-!-margin-top-6 govuk-!-margin-bottom-6">The basics</h1>

<div class="govuk-body govuk-!-margin-bottom-6">
 <h3>Strings</h3>
```{python}
print("Hello, world!")
```
</div>

<div class="govuk-body govuk-!-margin-bottom-6">
 <h3>Formulas</h3>
```{python}
print(round((1 + 3) * (9 - 2) / 3, 2))
```
</div>

<div class="govuk-body govuk-!-margin-bottom-6">
 <h3>Variables</h3>
```{python}
test_var_text = "Hello again!"
test_var_formula = 4 + 5
print(test_var_formula)
print(test_var_text)
```
</div>

<div class="govuk-body govuk-!-margin-bottom-6">
 <h3>Formulated variables</h3>
```{python}
test_var_formula = 100
test_var_formula = test_var_formula + 100
print(test_var_formula)
```
</div>

<div class="govuk-body govuk-!-margin-bottom-6">
 <h3>Combined variables</h3>
```{python}
num_years = 4
days_per_year = 365 
hours_per_day = 24
mins_per_hour = 60
secs_per_min = 60
total_secs = secs_per_min * mins_per_hour * hours_per_day * days_per_year * num_years
print(total_secs)
```
</div>
